metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3476 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in OpenEXR's B44 uncompression functionality in versionsbefore 3.0.0-beta. An attacker who is able to submit a crafted file toOpenEXR could trigger shift overflows, potentially affecting applicationavailability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3476` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr22 - 2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.6
openexr - 2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.6
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: openexr package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.6').
